title: SD Gundam G Generation ETERNAL Tier List
heading: SD Gundam G Generation ETERNAL Tier List

data.itemDescription: A UR Attacker known for ignoring defense and possessing fast movement. Best paired with Char Aznable (EX) for critical hits and evasion
A UR Attacker featuring high-speed melee attacks and critical hits. Optimal with Setsuna F. Seiei, enhancing attack speed and Trans-Am boosts
A UR Supporter that debuffs enemies and heals allies. Amuro Ray (EX) is the ideal pilot, providing barriers and additional support
A UR Supporter that buffs team attack and offers long-range capabilities. Best utilized with Kamille Bidan for morale boosts and extended range
An SSR Attacker delivering burst damage at short range. Edward Haro enhances mobility
A UR Defender boasting high HP and damage absorption. Amuro Ray (non-EX) maintains shield uptime
An SSR Defender serving as a budget tank, effective in early-game scenarios. Bernie Wiseman increases counterattack chances
An SSR Defender with area-of-effect attacks and substantial bulk, albeit slow. Four Murasame boosts AoE capabilities
An SSR Supporter providing solid buffs and favored for its lore significance. Paired with standard Amuro Ray
An SSR Attacker with balanced stats, useful in early-game stages. Heero Yuy enhances precision
An SR Attacker offering long-range attacks as a budget-friendly choice. Shiro Amada improves accuracy
An R Defender serving as a basic tank with low scalability. Suitable for any R-rank pilot
An R Attacker characterized by slow speed and weak damage. Utilizes a starter pilot
An R Supporter offering minimal support capabilities. Assigned to a generic AEU pilot
